column4: hey everyone ... i'm trying to build my own distro based on ubuntu. i have a working apt-mirror where all packets are signed with my own gpg-key. now i'm trying to netboot using that server to install everything - only the installer won't accept my mirror, because he doesn't like the keys. i already added my key to "/usr/share/keyrings/ubunt-keyring.gpg" in the initrd of the installer, but it's still not working. does anyone know what i can do to
we don't support "build you own distro" if you are building your own distro you should know what your doing
this is ubuntu support though not stivbutu support
